page.title: 05Entertainment
page.content: The{Floral Hall,}seating 1600, is a venue for summer and one-off theatre shows attracting national stars. It is also used for amateur productions. The nearby cricket club caters for private functions. The seafront {Corner Cafe}holds evening dances in summer. Dances, private functions and conferences are held during the rest of the year. The{Scalby Mills Hotel} caters for private functions and along with the{Ivanhoe public house}employs a pianist throughout the year, as does the{Newlands Park}during the winter. A guitarist entertains in summertime. The{Barrowcliff}and the{Highfield {public houses}have a singer each week. There are various summer evening entertainments at{Scalby Manor Hotel} and private functions during winter months.
